original_text: And when Jacob had made an end of commanding his sons, he gathered up his feet into the bed, and yielded up the ghost, and was gathered unto his people.
korean_text: 야곱이 아들에게 명하기를 마치고 그 발을 침상에 모으고 숨을 거두니 그의 백성에게로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And when Jacob had made an end of commanding his sons
he gathered up his feet into the bed
and was gathered unto his people
